description:
Indyeva has added some style points to the classic crew necked jumper. Starting at the asymmetrical cuffs and continuing up to the ribbed V-neck, the Maglia is like the grown up version of a retro jumper.

  • Quick-drying and wicking poly blend uses Lyocell for added softness, and a hint of spandex for an easy stretch
  • drirelease® lyocell wicks away moisture
  • Ribbed cuffs, collar, and hem keep the toasty air right where you want it
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
name: Indyeva Maglia Long Sleeve Top - Women's
